title: BABY
lyrics:
bamhaneul-e byeolbich-i
neoegedo ttoggat-eulkka stars
balaboneun ne nunbich-eun
ibyeol-ilan tteus-in geonga no
I don’t wanna hold you back
tteollineun siseon-eulo

gidaliji ma meonjeo mal-eul hae babe

I don’t wanna hold you back

geojisdoen siseondeullo

neol balabojanh-a babe

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

Tell me now

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

neol balabojanh-a babe

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

Tell me now

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

neol balabojanh-a

uli dul-i hamkkehaessdeon

binjaliman issdeon geolkka space

teum sailo dalbich-i

oneulttala banjjog-ilkka wae

I don’t wanna hold you back

eosaeghan siseon-eulo

dol-aboji ma meonjeo mal-eul hae babe

I dont wanna hold you back

bulg-eojin siseon-eulo

neol balabojanh-a babe

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

Tell me now

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

neol balabojanh-a babe

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

Tell me now

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

neol balabojanh-a

Maybe I just have to let you go

deuliwojin nae ma-eumcheoleom

Clouds are shrouding us in to the dark

salajin nae geulimjacheoleom

naega tteonagajulge

naega tteonagajulge babe

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

Tell me now

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

naega tteonagajulge babe

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

Tell me now

(I don’t wanna hold you back)

naega tteonagajulge babe
